programme.desc: Spring Break: At spring break, Claire starts spring cleaning, while Phil realises he's no spring chicken when Luke starts outperforming him at what seems like everything. (S6 Ep18)

programme.title: Below Deck Down Under
programme.desc: Brand new series - She's Just Not That Into You: Luka thinks a stew might be into him. And the final night of the season leads to arguing, crying and relationships in a shambles. (S2 Ep18)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: The Black Pearl: A struggling seafood restaurant, The Black Pearl, is hampered by debts, kitchen problems and three owners who all want to run things their way. (S2 Ep7/13) [SL]

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Island Time: For spring break, Barry talks Erica, Ren and the JTP into a discount vacation. Beverly worries when Adam considers taking time off after school. (S7 Ep19)

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: And One to Grow On: Phil tricks Luke into taking a dance class, but the joke's on him when the white lie indirectly lands him in the slammer. (S5 Ep11)

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Under Pressure: The high school open house puts the parents in a time warp when Claire gets stressed out by all the pressure. Jay teaches Phil how to play truant. (S5 Ep12)

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube Shorts
programme.desc: A short, cheeky clip featuring animals and food, from the always hilarious Tube that is Rude.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Cafe 36: Gordon Ramsay visits Cafe 36 in Chicago. Husband-and-wife team Terry and Carol are stuck in the past and their head chef's lax attitude is driving away customers. (S2 Ep10/13) [SL]

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Casa Roma: Gordon visits Casa Roma, the oldest restaurant in Lancaster, California. Although the bar is a success, the restaurant is failing and has had 20 chefs in two years. (S2 Ep8/13) [SL]

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer Simpson, This Is Your Wife: Homer signs the family up for a wife swap show, but easy-going husband Charlie (Ricky Gervais) develops a crush on Marge... (S17 Ep15/22)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Undercover Burns: Mr Burns goes undercover to see what the employees really think of him, and becomes their friends - to Smithers' alarm... (S32 Ep1)

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: A Second Prodigy and the Hottest Tips for Pouty Lips: Sheldon finds himself at odds with Paige once again when she considers enrolling at East Texas Tech. (S4 Ep16)

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: A Black Hole: The Coopers discuss the possibilities of black holes and alternate universes when Dr Sturgis comes over for dinner. (S4 Ep17)

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Three Turkeys: Phil is cooking Thanksgiving dinner this year with Luke as his sous chef. But Claire has no confidence in them and prepares a secret turkey of her own as backup. (S6 Ep8)

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Strangers in the Night: When Alex tells Phil and Claire she has a boyfriend, they worry that they've put too much pressure on her and that she's made up an imaginary boyfriend. (S6 Ep9)

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Larry's Wife: Phil seems to have found his niche in real estate - selling to recently divorced women. Luke invites his buddies over for a high-stakes poker game in the basement. (S5 Ep3)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Misinterpretation Agitation: A smitten doctor turns up at Penny's door after her flirtatious sales techniques for the pharmaceutical company work a little too well. (S8 Ep7)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Prom Equivalency: The girls decide to re-enact their high school proms with their current partners on the roof of the apartment building. (S8 Ep8)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Septum Deviation: When Leonard has to have minor surgery on his nose, Sheldon is the one who seems to need sympathy. Raj is upset when his parents split up. (S8 Ep9)

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: The Grand Chancellor and a Den of Sin: Sheldon battles President Hagemeyer's mysterious boss over the university's science requirements. (S5 Ep8)

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: The Yips and an Oddly Hypnotic Bohemian: While George Sr plays handyman at Brenda Sparks' house, Sheldon gets the science yips and must learn how not to think. (S5 Ep9)

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Knock 'em Down: Jay agrees to join Cam's bowling team for the finals, but doesn't realise that he's not eligible to play in the league. (S6 Ep20)

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Integrity: Phil and Jay run an errand together to pick up Lily's hand-me-down princess castle for Joe. Phil is upset that Claire won't let him buy a videogame console. (S6 Ep21)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Treehouse of Horror X: Ned comes back to haunt the Simpsons after Marge accidentally runs him down, and Bart and Lisa get zapped by radiation and become superheroes. (S11 Ep4/22)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: E-I-E-I-(Annoyed Grunt): The Simpsons are forced to flee to the countryside, where Homer accidentally invents highly addictive tomacco. But the animals like it too... (S11 Ep5/22)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Graduation Transmission: Leonard is invited to make a speech at his old high school. Howard and Sheldon can't make a toy drone fly. (S8 Ep22)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Maternal Combustion: Personalities collide when Sheldon and Leonard's mothers finally meet. Howard decides to 'man up' and do his share of the housework. (S8 Ep23)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Commitment Determination: Sheldon pressures Leonard and Penny to choose a date for their wedding while dealing with changes in his own relationship. (S8 Ep24)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Moe Goes from Rags to Riches: Moe is heckled for having no real pals so his best friend, the beloved bar rag, narrates his incredible 1000-year journey to Springfield. (S23 Ep12/22)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Large Marge: Marge accidentally gets breast implants after mistakenly thinking that Homer was flirting with two businesswomen while he was building houses for the homeless. (S14 Ep4/22)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer's Paternity Coot: The Simpsons receive a long-lost letter, which suggests that Homer's biological father is actually British treasure hunter Mason Fairbanks. (S17 Ep10/22)

programme.title: Popularity Papers
programme.desc: Odd Squads: It's Mapleview Middle's favourite school event: the Astounding Treasure Hunt! Every year, the school pairs off on an epic scavenger hunt. (S1, ep 21)

programme.title: Popularity Papers
programme.desc: Notes on a Vandal: Does helping everyone get better grades make you popular? When the tyrannical history teacher, Mr. Caplan, gives everyone a harsh grade, Lydia vows to challenge hers. (S1, ep 22)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Pretty Little Choirs: When a mean girl sabotages Phoebe in choir and takes advantage of Max by making him do her homework for her, the twins work together to get even with her. (S1, ep 18)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Paging Dr. Thunderman: Max and Phoebe take Billy to the hospital when he hurts his thumb. They must stop the doctors seeing Max's brain scan which could expose their powers! (S1, ep 19)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Mr. Nice Guy: A vigilante in a smiley-face mask has been punishing Swellviewians for being rude in public. Kid Danger and Captain Man's investigation leads them to a local TV celebrity. (S5, ep 31)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Theranos Boot: Henry and the other kids destroy Ray's prized movie prop. To replace it, Henry and Jasper travel to an alternate universe Man Cave before Ray finds out. (S5, ep 32)

programme.title: Hunter Street
programme.desc: The Butterfly Sun: With another stone found and a new riddle to solve, the gang returns to the planetarium, but get more than they were expecting. Will they solve the mystery in time? (S3, ep 18)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Smurfette and Blossom take Grouchy camping in 'Unsmurfable Smile', then in 'Mind the Cat', Gargamel falls under the mind control of Azrael and the Smurfs must help to set him free. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Some LIke It Not: After breaking Papa Smurf's telescope, Scaredy and Hefty disguise themselves as girls to avoid punishment. (S1, ep 5a)

programme.title: Best & Bester
programme.desc: Bester uncovers undelicious ocurrences in 'Donut Disturb', then in 'The Cursed Amulet', Best and Bester dig up Captain Ironfoot's Cursed Amulet, only to find that Belle wants it too. (S1, ep 17)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: In 'Greasy Buffoons', Mr. Krabs and Plankton woo customers with greasy entrees. Then in 'Model Sponge', SpongeBob tries a career at being a model in a kitchen sponge commercial.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Squidward cleans up the city of Bikini Bottom with help from SpongeBob in 'Keep Bikini Bottom Beautiful', and then in 'A Pal for Gary', SpongeBob brings Gary a pet that terrorizes him.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks
programme.desc: Alvin tells Theodore that he can turn rubbish into sweets in 'Alvin's Secret Powers', then in 'Warbie', The Chipmunks find a baby bird that's fallen from its nest. (S1, ep 24)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks
programme.desc: Brittany takes up painting to impress her fashion idol in 'Art For Art's Sake', and then in 'Mancave', Alvin, convinced that Julie and her son are trying to move in, tries to stop it. (S1, ep 25)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob finds a cute but inconvenient companion in 'Lighthouse Louie', then in 'Hiccup Plague', no one in Bikini Bottom is safe from a case of contagious hiccups.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Leni must protect her mannequin friend in 'Bye Tanya', then in 'What Lies Beneath', Dante buries a secret in the cemetery, and must stop the Morticians Club from discovering what it is. (S7, ep 14)

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel wishes to meet a live dinosaur in 'A Dinosaur in Dimmadelphia', then in 'Fearless', Hazel wishes that Jasmine was fearless. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Nowhere to Slide: The Thunder boys decide to survive 24 hours in the wilderness, while the girls try to bond over some of Barb's favourite farm activities from her childhood. (S4, ep 24)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Toon In For Danger: When Henry and Ray get a copy of the new Kid Danger & Captain Man cartoon and see that it's horrible, they must hurry to fix the cartoon before the big premiere party. (S4, ep 11)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Across the Universe: Alvin bets Bo Carter that alien life exists and only has a week to prove it or suffer embarrassing consequences.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Britt's Picks: Brittany's furious when she thinks Alvin has been writing on her blog and vows to get him back, but was it Alvin?

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Queen Bee: Brittany's dream of being a fashion designer turns into a nightmare when she gets a job and her ideas are stolen.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Pack Animal: When Dave tells Simon to get rid of some stuff, a few of his more dangerous experiments end up in the wrong hands.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Squidward finds a good book which happens to be SpongeBob's private diary, in 'Little Yellow Book', and then in 'Bumper to Bumper', Mrs. Puff is again teaching SpongeBob to drive.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob finds a nasty sea urchin living in the Krusty Krab in 'Eek, An Urchin!', and then in 'Squid's Defense', Squidward convinces SpongeBob and Sandy to teach him karate.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Mom and Dad win a trip to a resort and decide to take the kids in 'Suite and Sour', then in 'Back in Black', when Lucy gets a crush on a regular normal boy, her sisters give her a makeover. (S2, ep 4)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln's social standing is at stake when Lisa gets put into his 5th grade class in 'Making the Grade', then in 'Vantastic Voyage', the kids try and trick Dad into buying a cool new van. (S2, ep 5)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Alvin accidentally clones himself in 'Double Trouble', then in 'Liar Liar', Alvin tells a small lie that quickly turns into a huge disaster, dragging everyone into his tangled web. (S2, ep 10)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Brittany is preparing a class speech on inner beauty in 'Suck Toad', then in 'Secret Admirer', Alvin believes that Kevin has a secret crush on one of the Chipettes. (S2, ep 11)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: He Got Game Night: Hank raises the stakes of family game night to a new high, and each member of the family will do whatever it takes to win the grand prize. (S3, ep 15)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Kiss Me, Nate: Max is nervous when his girlfriend auditions for the romantic lead opposite a cute boy in the school play, and he convinces Phoebe to audition for the same role. (S3, ep 16)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Mouth Candy: Jasper's enthusiasm leads him to send Captain Man and Kid Danger into incidents that aren't crimes. When he's falsely accused and sent to jail, Henry and Ray must get him free. (S3, ep 5)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Gas Or Fail: When Captain Man finds himself trapped underground, Henry must devise a way to sneak out of his school's standardized testing to save Ray. (S3, ep 6)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: After Patrick eats life-threatening chum, SpongeBob helps him with his 'Chum Bucket List', then in 'Big Baby Patrick', Patrick devolves back into a baby so he can keep his childhood toys. (S2, ep 7)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Clyde and Nana Gayle are in competition in 'Out Of Step', then in 'Too Cool For School', Lincoln and friends need to get school back to normal when Principal Ramirez implements fishy rules. (S7, ep 9)

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Fly: When Hazel has trouble adjusting to her move to Dimmadelphia, she discovers her neighbours, Cosmo and Wanda, are fairies! (S1, ep 1)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Frozen Face Off: Bikini Bottom prepares for a sleigh race where the prize is $1 million, but plans change when they discover Plankton's scheme to steal the Krabby Patty formula during the race!

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Faulty Powers: After a training accident causes a glitch in Chloe's powers, Max and Phoebe look for a cure. Max thinks he's solved things, but creates brand new powers Chloe can't control. (S1, ep 2)

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries
programme.desc: An Unexpected Goodbye: The Institute is shutting down and Taylor and Lila are leaving Rock Island! On a final adventure to break into the Institute South Section, they're busted by Raquel. (S1, ep 20)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Danger Games - Part 1: When Dr. Minyak plans to ruin Double G's concert, Captain Man and Kid Danger join forces with the Game Shakers to defeat Dr. Minyak and keep Double G safe. (S4, ep 1)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Danger Games - Part 2: When Dr. Minyak plans to ruin Double G's concert, Captain Man and Kid Danger join forces with the Game Shakers to defeat Dr. Minyak and keep Double G safe. (S4, ep 2)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Mall Time Crooks: Phoebe and Max turn a trip to the mall to pick up Hank's birthday gift into chaos, with a run-in with security that threatens to derail their dad's birthday. (S2, ep 9)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: It's Not What You Link: Max and Link fight, so Phoebe helps them become friends. When Link starts spending more time with Max than her, Phoebe's plan may have worked too well. (S2, ep 21)

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: Alien Zoo: When Danger Force becomes the newest exhibit at an Alien Zoo, Miles must find a way to break them out before they become alien dinner. (S2, ep 15)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: The Great Ping Pong Scam: Tori discovers that her friends have been secretly going to a fancy restaurant instead of playing in an annual ping pong tournament. (S1, ep 15)

programme.title: Popularity Papers
programme.desc: Trendship Never Ends: Does keeping up with the trends make you popular? Everyone at Mapleview Middle is buzzing about the latest smartwatch craze that's sweeping the nation! (S1, ep 9)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Twin Henrys: Henry has Schwoz's shape-shifting android fill in for him at a family dinner so he can watch the MMA fight of the year with Charlotte and Ray. (S2, ep 16)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Grave Danger: When Ray starts behaving strangely, Henry and Charlotte investigate and are surprised to discover what's been causing it. (S2, ep 17)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Ditch Perfect: When Phoebe learns Max's band plans to dump him, she suspects that his superhero training is hurting his friendships. Determined to help, her good deeds backfire. (S4, ep 8)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: May Z-Force Be With You: Max and Phoebe ask Cherry to fill in after Phoebe injures herself before a meeting with the Z-Force, but a superhero emergency tests their future as crimefighters. (S4, ep 10)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Trapped In An RV: A heat wave hits LA and the gang heads for the beach in Beck's RV. But once there, they find themselves trapped inside as the temperature rises. (S1, ep 17)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Wi-Fi In The Sky: Tori's flight is delayed, leaving no time to finish a school project. She tries to work with them over video chat, but things keep getting in the way. (S1, ep 18)

programme.title: Popularity Papers
programme.desc: Personality Test: Lydia and Julie take a personality test to determine if they truly have the personality traits to be a Highly Popular Person. (S1, ep 23)

programme.title: Popularity Papers
programme.desc: Personality Test: Lydia and Julie take a personality test to determine if they truly have the personality traits to be a Highly Popular Person. (S1, ep 23)

programme.title: Popularity Papers
programme.desc: Let's Sick Together: Amid a house overrun by the flu, Lydia sets out to investigate whether the school will notice her absence and make her more popular. (S1, ep 24)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Breaking Dad: Hank becomes Max and Phoebe's new science teacher. When he accidentally eats special turkey sandwiches that make him fall asleep, the twins must help him out. (S1, ep 20)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: The Thunder Van: Hank brings the Thundervan for Phoebe to continue her superhero training, but when the kids take a joyride, Hank gives them a ride they will never forget. (S2, ep 3)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Rumblr: Captain Man creates a profile on a matchmaking app for heroes and villains. Kid Danger does the same, and the two set up a double-fight to square off with some new villains. (S5, ep 33)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Cave the Date: The gang set up a secret underground restaurant in the Man Cave for Charlotte's private dinner with a music superstar. When word gets out, unwanted guests crash the party. (S5, ep 34)

programme.title: Hunter Street
programme.desc: Appeals: Anika returns to the forest looking for answers, but comes across a shocking scene. The Hunters are doing everything to find their stolen artifacts. But will it be enough? (S3, ep 19)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Papa Smurf disappears in 'Where's Papa Smurf?', then in 'Who's Heftier?', Wimpy challenges Hefty to a test of strength and wins by accident! (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Tree of Knowledge: The Smurfs unwittingly ask Dimwitty for advice when he gets stuck in a hollowed out tree, thinking they've found the Tree of Knowledge. (S3, ep 7b)

programme.title: Best & Bester
programme.desc: Best and Bester decide to go on a match-making mission in 'That's so Cupid', and in 'Buddy Odour', Toot moves into the Sub with Best and Bester, but there's no getting away from her smell! (S1, ep 18)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick buy a toy and have to learn to share it in 'Yours, Mine and Mine', and then in 'Kracked Krabs', SpongeBob goes with Mr. Krabs to the Cheapest Crab Convention.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob's Last Stand: SpongeBob and Patrick protest against the construction of a highway that would destroy Jellyfish Fields.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks
programme.desc: Simon agrees to face off against Derek on a reality show in 'I Will Survive', then in 'Alvin's Got A Brand New Bag', Alvin accidentally ruins Brittany's bag and must replace it. (S1, ep 26)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: When Alvin makes fun of Simon's magic act, Simon challenges him to a magic duel in 'Simon the Superb', then in 'The Sub', Alvin reluctantly signs up to teach the after school music class. (S2, ep 3)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Plankton needs more help stealing the secret formula in 'Plankton's Intern', then in 'Patrick's Tantrum', Patrick gets angry whenever he hears a bell, so his friends help him in their own ways.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Luan takes the lead in the school play in 'An Inspector Falls', then in 'One In A Million', Lincoln and Clyde are determined to be Flip's millionth customer to bag the big reward. (S7, ep 15)

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel wishes she lived in a luxury hotel in 'Wellsington Hotellsington', then in '1500 Minutes of Fame', Hazel wishes she was famous at school. (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: The Thundermans

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Car Trek: Charlotte's birthday road trip to see the Boo Man Group perform gets sidetracked by a Captain Man and Kid Danger emergency. (S4, ep 12)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: The Devil Wears Rodentia: Brittany's dream of being a fashion designer turns into a nightmare when she gets a job and her ideas are stolen.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Career Day: Alvin suspects Dave of being a local bank robber when Dave starts acting suspiciously and giving the boys gifts.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Lost in Space Camp: Theodore must prove he's got "the right stuff" when the Chipmunks and Chipette's head off to space camp.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Super Hot Chocolate: Theodore goes into a deep funk after he burns his tongue on some super-hot chocolate and loses his sense of taste.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: An imprisoned Plankton tries to break out of jail and steal the secret formula in 'Jailbreak!', and then in 'Evil Spatula', Spongebob replaces his broken spatula with a magical one from Plankton.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Mr Krabs gets trapped in Bikini Bottom's brand-new bank in 'Safe Deposit Krabs', and then in 'Plankton's Pet', Plankton gets a pet to cheer himself up.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lola and Lana try out for Bluebell Scouts in 'Patching Things Up', and in 'Cheater by the Dozen', when Lincoln and Clyde think Bobby is cheating on Lori they follow him gathering evidence. (S2, ep 6)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: The kids take home security to the next level in 'Lock 'N Loud', then in 'The Whole Picture', Lincoln and Clyde try to recreate all of Lincoln's childhood photos, before his memory fades. (S2, ep 7)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Alvin encourages Simon to write a frank email in 'Un-send!', then in 'The Orb', when Simon notices that Theodore has a hard time saying no, he creates the "No-Buddy". (S2, ep 12)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: The Principal's cat goes missing in 'The Music Box', then in 'Special Delivery', Theodore's been mistakenly mailed off in a box, so Simon and Alvin have to get him home. (S2, ep 13)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Dog Day After-School: Desperate to get Mom's tablet back after it is confiscated at school, Billy and Nora get help from Phoebe, who wants to prove she can be as sneaky as Max. (S3, ep 18)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Original Prankster: Despite promising his girlfriend he would stop pranking, Max pulls an epic gag which his friend is about to get expelled for. (S3, ep 21)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Hour of Power - Part 1: When criminal Drex embarrasses Kid Danger and traps Captain Man, Kid Danger must use the help of Schwoz to gain a super power and defeat Drex. (S3, ep 7)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Hour of Power - Part 2: When criminal Drex embarrasses Kid Danger and traps Captain Man, Kid Danger must use the help of Schwoz to gain a super power and defeat Drex. (S3, ep 8)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Bunny sends Squidina to camp, so Patrick works with new staff in 'Is there a Director in the House?', then in 'Star Cruise', the Star family enjoys a cruise ship vacation... in outer space. (S2, ep 8)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Luna and the Moon Goats have to find a replacement guitarist in 'Music To My Fears', then in 'Fluff and Foiled', Lincoln is determined to get laundry duty finished as fast as possible. (S7, ep 10)

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel faces the Wish Trials in 'Department of Magical Violations', then in 'Teacher's Pal', Hazel wishes her teachers were friends. (S1, ep 2)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SquarePants Family Vacation: When SpongeBob and Patrick get lost on a family road trip to the Great Barrier Reef, they end up on the adventure of a lifetime.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Bummer School: Chloe, Jinx, and Booch are designing a new school mascot, but Max and Phoebe's fighting ruins the project. They realize their twin-fighting impacts Chloe in new ways now. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries
programme.desc: The Cave To Everywhere - Part 1: On the day of the ball, Taylor is convinced her Uncle Charlie is trying to make contact. She sets off on a dangerous scavenger hunt to retrieve his message. (S2, ep 1)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Danger Games - Part 3: When Dr. Minyak plans to ruin Double G's concert, Captain Man and Kid Danger join forces with the Game Shakers to defeat Dr. Minyak and keep Double G safe. (S4, ep 3)

programme.title: Henry Danger

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Cape Fear: Phoebe tries to get back in superhero training, but when she sneaks out to a party and saves someone's life, she asks Max to take the credit, and he becomes a hero. (S2, ep 22)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Call of Lunch Duty: Phoebe discovers that Max is behind the latest pranks at school, but when she refuses to give up his secret to the principal, she must face the consequences. (S2, ep 23)

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: Let's Go to the Movies!: ShoutOut has a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to sell a movie to Hollywood bigshot Deuce Van Nuys, and the rest of the gang share their own epic movie ideas too. (S2, ep 16)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Wok Star: Tori helps Jade find a theatre to perform a play Jade wrote. When the sponsor demands changes that will ruin Jade's play, Tori must make things right before opening. (S1, ep 16)

programme.title: Popularity Papers
programme.desc: Freaks and Cliques: When Julie's bumped up to grade 8 English, her excellent work catches the attention of the Glossip Girls, the most popular clique at school! (S1, ep 10)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Ox Pox: When Piper gets a mysterious illness, Captain Man must travel back in time to the 1700s to find the only cure. (S2, ep 18)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: I Know Your Secret: Henry gets a series of mysterious notes from someone and worries that this person may know his secret identity. (S2, ep 19)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: 21 Dump Street: After Max is dumped, Phoebe tries to cheer him up by introducing him to another girl. However, Max's date steals Dr. Colosso when she sees Max's treatment of him. (S4, ep 14)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Super Dupers: Max and Phoebe use their powers to give their friend a confidence boost, but the gesture backfires when he starts to think he that he has superpowers of his own. (S4, ep 15)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Part 1: Cat and Jade get banned from a karaoke bar. The boys look after Trina after her wisdom teeth are removed, while Tori helps Jade and Cat get revenge. (S1, ep 19)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Part 2: Cat, Jade and Tori return to the karaoke bar for a sing-off, while the boys struggle to look after Trina. (S1, ep 20)

programme.title: Popularity Papers

programme.desc: Broken Back Kotter: Izzy nominates Chef for the Daycare Professional of the Year award and will do whatever it takes to see him win. As it turns out, it takes a lot. (S3 Ep3)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Weekend at Buddy's: After Cody's best friend doll breaks on their watch, Owen and Beth put themselves in grave danger while trying to do the right thing. (S3 Ep4)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: MacArthur Park: After losing countless jobs because of the kids, MacArthur shows up at the school seeking revenge. (S3 Ep5)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Last Mom Standing: When Chef's mum and Leshawna's grandmother drop their loved ones off at the same time, it kicks off a dangerous competition for who is the most caring mother figure. (S3 Ep6)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Carmageddon: Duncan is rattled when Chef, tired of having his car destroyed, buys a new one that is completely indestructible. (S3 Ep7)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Sugar & Spice & Lightning & Frights: Two new kids show up at the daycare. Duncan and Leshawna take issue with not what makes them different, but what makes them similar to the newbies. (S3 Ep8)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Polar Bear: Nutty Hill is suffering from a heat wave. Searching for a bit of cool air, Grizzy has a brilliant idea. He'll get into the fridge, where the temperature will be more bearable. (S1 Ep1)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Spread: Grizzy is frustrated: just as he was about to coat a nice big fresh salmon with chocolate spread and snuggle up in front of the TV, he discovers that the pantry is empty! (S1 Ep2)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Cellular Bear: Grizzy's nap is interrupted by the forest ranger's cell phone. (S1 Ep3)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Jurassic Bear: Freed by the thawing ice, a giant egg slides up to the front door of the cabin. The lemmings watch the hatching of a baby dinosaur that soon thinks they are its parents. (S1 Ep4)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Extreme Fitness: In order to woo the she-bear he's infatuated with, Grizzy decides to take things in hand and get into shape with the ranger's bodybuilding equipment. (S1 Ep5)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Domestic Robots: Grizzy discovers that the ranger's new robot vacuum cleaner also gives very pleasant back massages, but the lemmings see the new gadget more as competition... (S1 Ep6)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Mass Control: While searching for the television remote control, Grizzy discovers a gadget that controls various functions in the cabin. (S1 Ep7)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Under Control: To make sure that the lemmings don't snatch his chocolate spread while he's taking his nap, Grizzy turns the fridge into a safe - combination lock and all. (S1 Ep8)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Popcorn Party: The lemmings have invented a new popcorn game. When Grizzy notices that his she-bear seems to be drawn by the smell, he invites her over for a snack, just the two of them. (S1 Ep9)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Dancing with the Bears: Grizzy wants to learn to dance the mambo to please the she-bear he's in love with. (S1 Ep10)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Role Change: After receiving a terrible blow over the head, Grizzy is no longer the same: he thinks he's a rodent! (S1 Ep11)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemming Tonic: Grizzy is exhausted and the couch has never seemed so enticing! He goes to fetch a pillow and a sleeping mask, but the lemmings have entirely different plans for the couch. (S1 Ep12)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Way Back Wendel: Courtney must deliberately lose a challenge or let the entire world go back in time. It's a hard choice for her. (S2 Ep29)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Stingin' In The Rain: When Chef gets locked outside during a storm, the kids mistakenly assume he's a robber and decide to protect the Daycare - by any means necessary. (S2 Ep30)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Cartoon Realism: Gwen is frustrated by Beth's silly belief that cartoons are real, but they visit an animation studio and discover that Beth is right! (S2 Ep31)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Oww: When the kids discover Chef's past as a disgraced pro wrestler, they invite his old tag team partner to help put on a charity show. But is the big match about reunion or revenge?! (S2 Ep32)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Jelly Aches: The school descends into chaos after getting a visit from Gazunga, the Jealousy Troll. (S2 Ep33)

programme.title: Total Dramarama

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Ghoul Spirit: Gwen rejects the friendship of a friendly ghost. (S2 Ep35)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Duncan Carving: Duncan takes advantage of a questionable Halloween legend to steal candy from his classmates. (S2 Ep36)

programme.title: Droners

programme.title: Jade Armor

programme.title: Jade Armor
programme.desc: The Mess: Bad luck! L.J. breaks a Shard-embedded mirror so Jade becomes a trouble magnet while tracking the Shard. Worse, the evil Crimson Lord is back in town. (S1 Ep2)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
